TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartZoneCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartZoneCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控制項的唯讀集合。

span.span: Contains a read-only collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含的集合存在於 Web 組件頁面的控制項。The class contains the collection of controls that exist on a Web Parts page. 它主要供來追蹤和管理所有區域的控制項。It is used primarily by the control to track and manage all the zones. 控制項會保留的頁面上的區域集合的參考，以其唯讀屬性。The control keeps a reference to the collection of zones on a page in its read-only property. 類別就很有用，當您想要在此同時執行多個區域或其內容上的作業，或當您需要找出特定區域及檢查或變更其內容。The class is useful when you want to carry out operations on multiple zones or their contents at the same time, or when you need to locate a particular zone and examine or change its contents. 雖然集合區域本身是唯讀的您無法變更的集合物件本身的大小、 您仍然可以取得個別的區域，則集合內的參考和當您有個別的區域物件的參考，您可以變更它的屬性值。Although the collection of zones itself is read-only and you cannot change the size of the collection object itself, you can still get references to the individual zones within the collection, and when you have a reference to an individual zone object, you can change its property values. 類別有兩個建構函式。The class has two constructors. 第一個，只是初始化一個新的空執行個體。The first one, , simply initializes an empty instance of a new . 第二個， ，藉由傳入現有區域的集合初始化集合。The second one, , initializes a collection by passing in an existing collection of zones. 類別包含屬性。The class contains an property. 這個屬性可讓您找到藉由傳入的字串識別碼在集合內的控制項。This property allows you to locate a control within the collection by passing in a string identifier. 藉由比對的字串識別項的值位於區域屬性上的區域。The zone is located by matching the string identifier to the value of the property on a zone. 類別也有數種方法，可用來檢查或存取其內容。The class also has several methods that are useful for examining or accessing its contents. 方法會判斷集合中是否存在特定區域。The method determines whether a particular zone exists in the collection. 方法會將集合複製到陣列物件。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 最後，方法會傳回集合中的特定區域的索引。Finally, the method returns the index of a particular zone within the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 在程式碼範例包含三個部分： 兩個區段的程式碼，以及如何執行範例的說明。The code example contains three parts: two sections of code, and an explanation of how to run the example. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是包含三種網頁每一個都包含單一的伺服器控制項的控制項。The first part of the code example is a Web page that contains three controls, each of which contains a single server control. 雖然這些伺服器控制項所有標準的 ASP.NET 控制項，但是它們可以做為控制在執行階段，因為它們都位於區域。Although these server controls are all standard ASP.NET controls, they can act as controls at run time because they are placed within a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含的程式碼示範如何使用的部分類別類別。The second part of the code example is the partial class that contains the code to demonstrate usage of the class. 此程式碼會處理網頁上的事件。This code handles the events for the Web page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#2)] 將網頁瀏覽器中的載入。Load the page in a browser. 三個區域會顯示具有其所包含的伺服器控制項。The three zones are visible with their contained server controls. 頁面底部附近是數個按鈕，其中每一個示範如何使用某些層面物件。Near the bottom of the page are several buttons, each of which demonstrates some aspect of working with the object. 按一下以查看其效果的區域和其內容上的每個按鈕。Click each button to see its effect on the zones and their contents. 若要檢視每個按鈕示範的某些方面與相關聯的程式碼物件，作為此程式碼範例的第二個部分上面提及的部分類別檔中檢視的程式碼。To view the code associated with each button that demonstrates some aspect of the object, view the code in the partial class file referenced above as the second part of this code example.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式由控制項，Web 組件控制項集合中中的其他控制項或自訂的開發人員的程式碼中，若要建立的唯讀集合存在於 Web 組件頁面的控制項。The constructor is used by the control, by other controls in the Web Parts control set, or by custom developer code, to create a read-only collection of the controls that exist on a Web Parts page.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的空執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會使用它自己的建構函式內的這個建構函式來初始化的新執行個體Web 組件頁面的類別。The control uses this constructor within its own constructor to initialize a new instance of the class for a Web Parts page.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webPartZones) cil managed

span.span: An of objects.

summary.span: 透過傳入 物件的集合，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式，當您想要建立的自訂集合執行程式設計作業，在其上的物件。Use the constructor when you want to create a custom collection of objects to carry out programmatic operations on them. 比方說，您可以存取屬性，並建立子集物件，在 Web 組件頁面上，將他們指派物件，然後再執行作業的子控制項上的該子集的各種屬性區域。For example, you could access the property and create a subset of objects on a Web Parts page, assigning them to a object, and then carry out operations on the child controls or various properties of only that subset of zones. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor. 此範例的完整程式碼的範例 > 一節中找到類別概觀。The complete code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 在下列程式碼區段中，請注意它會將指派物件所擷取的值的變數屬性。In the following section of code, notice that it assigns a object to a variable by retrieving the value of the property. 如果您想，而不是指派來自所有區域屬性，您可以建立各種物件包含在頁面上，所有區域的子集，並將陣列指派給新物件。If you wanted, rather than assigning all the zones from the property, you could create an array of objects containing a subset of all the zones on the page, and assign the array to a new object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#6)] 建立集合之後，您就可以輕鬆地逐一查看集合，並在所有包含的區域或其內容上執行作業。After the collection is created, you can easily iterate through the collection and perform operations on all the contained zones or their contents. 若要執行範例程式碼，載入網頁瀏覽器，並按一下**切換動詞命令呈現模式**上每個區域的按鈕。To execute the example code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Toggle Verb Render Mode** button on each zone. 替代項目區域中包含的每個伺服器控制項的標題列中動詞命令的呈現方式。This alternates how the verbs in the title bar of each server control contained in a zone are rendered. 動詞命令可顯示在下拉式選單中，或直接為標題列中的連結。The verbs can appear in a drop-down menu, or directly as links in the title bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您檢查特定物件，並判斷它是否在集合。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is in a collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 中的範例 > 一節找到完整的程式碼範例中，包含使用者控制項，包含區域中和包含的程式碼中，部分類別檔案的頁面類別概觀。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下一節的程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要執行的程式碼，中載入網頁瀏覽器中，並按一下**coll包含 WebPartZone2** 按鈕。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Coll. Contains WebPartZone2** button. summary.span: 複製集合至 物件的陣列。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，當您想要建立自訂的陣列，可以包含在區域集合，這些區域的子集或超集這些區域。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the zones in the collection, a subset of those zones, or a superset of those zones. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 中的範例 > 一節找到完整的程式碼範例中，包含使用者控制項，包含區域中和包含的程式碼中，部分類別檔案的頁面類別概觀。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下一節的程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following section of the code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要執行程式碼，請在中載入網頁瀏覽器中，，然後按一下**陣列中的區域名稱** 按鈕。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Zone Names from Array** button. 區域的集合會載入到陣列中，而區域的所有識別碼都會都複製到標籤。The collection of zones is loaded into an array, and all zone IDs are copied into a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個區域 Web 組件頁面上，您需要知道某一個區域比其他區域的序數位置。The method is useful if you have multiple zones on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one zone relative to the other zones. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 中的範例 > 一節找到完整的程式碼範例中，包含使用者控制項，包含區域中和包含的程式碼中，部分類別檔案的頁面類別概觀。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下一節的程式碼示範如何使用方法。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要執行程式碼，請在中載入網頁瀏覽器中，，然後按一下**WebPartZone1 索引** 按鈕。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **WebPartZone1 Index** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您存取物件內特定區域中使用的字串識別項的集合。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using a string identifier for a particular zone. 所有比對的字串識別項不區分大小寫。All matching on string identifiers is case-insensitive.
